description: Clear trail/track through mixed forest that runs from Langford north of  Highway 1, to Munns rd.  A lake a many stream crossing make this trail picturesque.  The cutlines offer good bird sighting opportunities.  The hill offers expansive views across Thetis Lake Park. The trail is useful because from it, you can continue up and over Mount Work down to the Saanich Inlet at McKenzie Bight.  The first 3.2 km can easily be done with a mountain bike.
directions:
The main trail head is at 48deg28.276 N 123deg 20.347W at the end of 
Gourman rd.  To get there go west on highway 1 from Victoria.  Turn north on  to Millstream, East on Trenor, North on Gourman.    
The final trail head on Munns rd is at 48deg31.011 N 123 29.445 W on Munns rd. close to the parking lot for Mount work.
You can also access the middle of the trail at the trail head at the end of  Stuart Mtn. Rd off of Millstream Rd.  48deg29.900 N 123deg29.661W
title: Thetis to Munns rd
